com.sonyericsson.extras.liveware.extension.util.notification

クラス DelayedContentObserver

  • java.lang.Object
    • ContentObserver
      • com.sonyericsson.extras.liveware.extension.util.notification.DelayedContentObserver

  • public abstract class DelayedContentObserver
extends ContentObserver
    The delayed content observer is used to handle a content observer change after a delay. If more content observer changes are triggered during the delay the original change is deleted and a new delay is set.

    • フィールドの概要

      フィールド 
      修飾子とタイプ フィールドと説明
      static int CONTACTS_UPDATE_DELAY 
      static int EVENT_READ_DELAY

    • メソッドの概要

      メソッド 
      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明
      void onChange(boolean selfChange) 
      abstract void onChangeDelayed()
      onChangeDelayed is called when the delay has passed and no new changes has been triggered during the delay.
